# HSK 1

## Week1: Greetings and numbers

## Week2: Family and school/university

### Lesson 1 她是谁 Tā shì shéi？Who is she?

### Lesson 2 我有一只大狗 Wǒ yǒu yì zhī dà ɡǒu I have a big dog

### Lesson 3 我的汉语老师 Wǒ de hànyǔ lǎoshī My Chinese teacher

### Lesson 4 会说汉语很酷！Huì shuō hànyǔ hěn kù! Speaking Chinese is cool!

### Lesson 5 他是你的同学吗 Tā shì nǐ de tónɡxué mɑ？Is he your classmate?
